title: Where should I put MsgFilterRules.dat in TB 102?
content: I have been using TB for many years. In previous version, filter rules data were stored in: MsgFIlterRules.dat file. I find no such file in TB 102. I can copy the MsgFilterRules.dat file from a previous installation, but where should I put it? The folder arrangement of TB 102 seem quite different from that of my previous version, which was 78. I am using MX linux 21.3.
creator: faure212

title: Junk emails not automatically removed
content: Junk emails are marked in red but are not moved automatically to junk folder. I have Mozilla on another machine which does automatically move them. I have copied the settings but they still just sit in my inbox marked in red waiting for me to move them. Any help appreciated
creator: carlnichollswork

title: synchronize tb calendar with mac desktop calendar app
content: Hello, i need to synchronize the TB calendar with my macbookpro calendar app. it seems that what we find on internet is not appropriate to the current versions. thanks for your assistance regards
creator: jlrb

title: Address books
content: I find the current address books really really difficult to use. Why three different books which seem incompatible? Whole groups appear and then just disappear at random! Trying to add names to a mailing group is a pain. I end up using 'Mail' in desperation sometimes. The previous system was infintely easier to use in every respect. Please can it be reinstated! Richard Beaton York
creator: rbeaton026

title: mail inviate sparite
content:
Dopo aver inviato una qualsiasi mail compare questo messaggio: "Il messaggio è stato inviato, ma non è stata salvata una copia nella cartella inviati (Posta inviata) a causa di un errore di rete o di accesso al file. È possibile riprovare o salvare localmente il messaggio su Cartelle locali/Posta inviata-". Come risolvere? L'account è imap.

Cliccando poi su "posta inviata" - "proprietà" - "ripara cartella" le mail sono sparite. Come ritrovarle?
creator: carlotta.barale02

title: Unable to send and receive emails
content: Since upgrading Thunderbird , I am unable to send and receive emails
